SEARCH
Package gui

Class Viewer

java.lang.Object
app.JApplication
gui.Viewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, WindowListener, Runnable, EventListener, RootPaneContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameLauncher
public class Viewer extends app.JApplication implements ActionListener
Viewer - main UI for the game. Cleaned up: removed magic numbers/strings, added named constants and short student-style comments to explain intent. Functionality is preserved.

  • Constructor Details

    • Viewer

      public Viewer(String[] args)
      Construct the Viewer. Use a default stage initialized with the default character.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt)
      Central action handler for UI buttons.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      evt - the ActionEvent triggered by a button press

    • startWindow

      public void startWindow()
      Build and display the main start window.

    • handleStart

      public void handleStart()
      Replace the current UI with the stage view and start the game's stage loop. This mirrors the original behavior (Tracks.resetTracks called first to ensure a fresh start when returning from other screens).

    • endScreen

      public void endScreen(String imageName)
      Show the end-screen with a given image and two buttons. This preserves previous functionality while making layout constants explicit.
      Parameters:
      imageName - the image file to show on the end screen

    • viewCharacter

      public void viewCharacter(String characterName)
      Utility to show a character portrait next to the selection buttons.
      Parameters:
      characterName - the image file name of the character to show

    • handleCharacter

      public void handleCharacter()
      Build the character selection screen using the CHARACTERS constant array.

    • init

      public void init()
      Lifecycle init: show start window and begin monitors for health/boss states.
      Specified by:
      init in class app.JApplication

    • startHealthMonitor

      public void startHealthMonitor()
      Poll the player's health; when it reaches zero show the lose screen. Timer frequency is defined by HEALTH_CHECK_DELAY_MS constant.

    • startDeathMonitor

      public void startDeathMonitor()
      Poll the boss's health; when boss dies show the boss-loss screen.

    • playAudio

      public static void playAudio(String audioFile)
      Play audio via ResourceFinder. Clips are stored so older clips are stopped before new ones are stored (keeps audio behavior consistent with original).

    • playButtonAudio

      public static void playButtonAudio(String audioFile)
      Play a short button sound without replacing the demo/looping music.
      Parameters:
      audioFile - the audio file to play
